basic.description: This course explores one or more non-classical logics, such as intuitionistic, many-valued, modal, provability, quantum, relevance, and tense. A mastery of the syntax and semantics of, and a natural deduction system for, first order logic is presumed.
basic.subject: PHI
basic.title: Modern Logic II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: PHI 3130 or equivalent, or instructor permission.
